nodes.text: The HL-27 light blaster pistol was a small, yet powerful blaster pistol manufactured by Coronet Arms.
A superb example of the superior craftsmanship of Coronet Arms, the HL-27 was favored by gentry, and those wanting to carry a first-rate blaster without announcing that they were armed.

An excellent choice for those preferring discretion without sacrificing firepower, the HL-27 was an accurate blaster that was easily concealed; as a result it was not unheard of for CorSec agents to carry an HL-27 instead of the more common CDEF blaster pistol, as the two weapons shared nearly identical range and firepower.
